title: Wet: More Aqua Erotica
description: This is a waterproof, tear and stain resistant seductive collection of erotica, to enjoy wherever life takes you! Printed in unique DuraBooks[trademark] format, read it in the bath, in the sauna or a night-lit pool Kind to the unlike traditional forms of paper that can only be recycled a number of times, Durabooks are designed to be infinitely 'upcyclable' so the basic materials can be used again and again. Stories cover the spectrum of erotic tastes and inclinations! Compiled by Mary Anne Mohanraj, it contains contributions from today's boldest erotic voices including familiar and newly discovered writers Mary Gaitskill, Simon Sheppard, Cecilia Tan and Jack Murnighan.'Read him erotica in the tub. The books are waterproof, so you can do a little splish-splashing as you read aloud.' - "Cosmopolitan". 'Stylish, sexy and fun' - "Synopsis". It contains erotic stories exploring the depths of love, lust and the infinite possibilities of water, covering the spectrum of sexual tastes and inclinations! "Wet" promises to tantalize those daring enough to test its waters - so unforgettably sexy you'll want to try it out on a secluded beach, a night-lit pool, a steamy sauna, or in a sensual bath for two. What's amazing is you can! Printed on a unique waterproof, tear and stain-resistant material, it can withstand a variety of watery environments. So go on, dive in.
author: Mary Anne Mohanraj
